string-array.name: class_info
string-array.item: Name: Barbarian / HitDice: d12 / ArmorProficiencies: none / WeaponProficiencies: simple, martial / ToolProficiencies: none / SavingThrows: Str, Con / SkillProficiencies: 2 - Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, Survival / ASI: 4, 8, 12, 16, 19 / Features / 1: Rage, (Rage advantage), (Rage increase), (Rage resistance), Unarmored Defense (Barbarian) -
